orchestrate.translation[0].definitions[0: to organize an important event or a complicated plan, especially secretly
The riots were orchestrated by anti-government forces.
orchestrate.translation[0].definitions[1: to arrange a piece of music so that it can be played by an orchestra
orchestrate.translation[1].definitions[0: to organize an important or complicated event, plan etc, sometimes secretly
The company orchestrated a big public-relations effort to promote its new cereal.
